title: Trump Budget Showdown, House Budget Committee Chair John Yarmuth
itunes:title: Trump Budget Showdown, House Budget Committee Chair John Yarmuth
description:
Kevin discusses President Trump's 2020 budget proposal with Congressman John Yarmuth, a Kentucky Democrat and Chairman of the House Budget Committee, Sery Kim, Republican Strategist and former Senior Advisor in the Trump Administration and Raul Alvillar, Democratic Strategist and former national political director for the Democratic National Committee.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Kevin discusses President Trump's 2020 budget proposal with Congressman John Yarmuth, a Kentucky Democrat and Chairman of the House Budget Committee, Sery Kim, Republican Strategist and former Senior Advisor in the Trump Administration and Raul Alvillar, Democratic Strategist and former national political director for the Democratic National Committee.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
